page.title: 07LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: The new{Golf}course opened in 1983.It provides 28 acres of golf for local people and tourists. On average 150 go to the club each week. {Camping}is popular at Rhosgoch Holiday Park; most people stay in static caravans placed in landscaped park. They come to enjoy the peace of the area; as yet these villages are not on the well beaten hoiday track. Older people and families are the groups which favour Rhosgoch. {Trekking}is a tourist attraction to which people come all the year round. It is well established since opening in 1975 and the 15 horses available are popular with the B+B guests and campers who use them. The{Aerobics}class has 10 members.Most are local farmers wives who go for for company as well as exercise for an hour every Monday.
